full_text:
Yesterday's game was awful for Chiefs fans...
Here's each half games of Patrick Mahomes' carrer.
Against Bengals, it was one of the best and worst halves of his carrer.
Sad day for #ChiefsKingdom 

Data: #nflverse https://t.co/5aQPBhlxVB

If it felt like you were witnessing a historic collapse (and a total 180) in yesterday's KC/CIN game, that's because you were.

No QB in #nflverse playoff history has had a larger dropoff from 1st to 2nd half EPA than Mahomes did yesterday––and 2nd place is almost a TD behind. https://t.co/iIMNkFMdNz
